name: Dungeon Deathball
description: Turn-based roguelike meets arcade death-sport, where every dungeon is a unique gauntlet of brutal challenges. Can you survive the trials of Dungeon Deathball and win back your freedom?

name: Beyond Minimalism
description: This small experimental first person minimalistic style game gives one and only quest for you. Walking around rooms of strange labyrinth look for clues to reach nature.

name: Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown
description: Master Pyrox Wizard Smackdown is a fast-paced arcade-style multiplayer game for up to 8 players. Avoid the fireballs, knock your opponents down, collect power-ups and cast spells. The game offers single player, competitive and cooperative game modes and a built-in level editor.

name: The Duller
description: The Duller - is a dynamic retro-style game in which you have to defend the Earth..

name: Artillery Cats
description: Artillery Cats is a 2-8 player party battle game based off the old classic 'Bomberman'. Battle it out with your friends using unique cats with their own special abilities (More cats to come) on 4 different styles of maps each having a 4 or 8 player version. Each of the maps features its own unique mechanics that directly interacts with the way the players will have to fight whether in the form of an added threat or somehow changing how bombs work.

name: 13 Cycles
description: Chaos! Freedom! Run on ceilings, customize bizzare spells, shape a square planet that changes every cycle. Its core is for the taking.

name: The Lost Sky
description: The Lost Sky is a 2D multi-directional action game set in a dystopian world.

name: Villager's Biography
description: Nowadays, the villagers, each more awesome than the next. There are not many villagers like you who have worked hard to earn money. Collecting, fishing, stealing, working, cooking, a variety of ways to make money, two actress in a leading role can be married. The next life winner is you!

name: Demolition Ball
description: In 2124, an alien race approaches planet Earth. Their intentions are unknown... Well, not really, Demolition Ball is a classic Breakout-style game with multiple game modes to offer some variation to the original game style. Of course the basic concept remains the same: destroy bricks with a ball.

name: Feelin
description: Feelin is a creative world-building sandbox game. Build your imagination world with simple wood resources, for example, wood house, tower, sea port base, famous architectures. Also enjoy sharing your lovely scenes and artistic architectures on SNS.

name: Aztec Number
description:
Challenge puzzle masters from all over the world
Accompanied by powerful sound effects,
solve 108 puzzles
and take possession of
the secret treasure of the Aztecs.

name: The Perfect Unit
description: The Perfect Unit is a puzzle. On each level you need to arrange items around the room in the correct order to bring the robot to the exit.

name: Magic Realm: Online
description: Magic Realm: Online is wave-based objective defense game featuring unique playable characters and a beautiful large map that allows strategic positioning. Play on your own or online with up to 4 people that can join anytime during the match and defend the Source Crystal from power-hungry invaders from another world

name: Ales Dash
description:
Ales Dash is a Side-Scrolling 3D Action Game.
You control Ales running forward and Clear the Level while over obstacles.

name: Infinite World
description:
A PM was involved in a bug 
and putted into an infinite procedural world

name: Playne
description: A game designed to help improve mental well-being by helping players build a daily habit of meditation. Every day you meditate, the game world grows and transforms. Build resilience to stress, experience calm and relaxation.

name: HellCat
description: The protagonist is a cat. To whom nothing remains but to arm himself in the fight against the army of devilish creatures and become a HellCat.

name: Solitude - Escape of Head
description: It’s an adventure of young Emilie, who went to the world created by her little brother to save him. Emilie’s youngest brother, has locked himself in his mind after the accident...

name: BQM: BlockQuest Maker
description:
Create & Play, instant death dungeon RPG! You can make your own gimmick packed dungeon? And you can share it to the world?
BQM is a simple game maker that gives you both chance to play dungeons designed by other users and to create your original, bewildering one!

name: Colonumbers
description: Colonumbers is a new brain teaser game with numbers and colors!

name: Sea of Lies: Tide of Treachery - Collector's Edition
description: Can you find and catch the notorious Sea Ripper?

name: Myths of the World: Of Fiends and Fairies - Collector's Edition
description: The rat catcher’s after more than rats this time. He’s kidnapping fairy folk!

name: Stones of Yalmrith
description: Take on the adventure of Andor in an exceptional world where he should learn about his existence and gain knowledge to take new paths .

name: Alice in Wonderland: 3D Game
description: The adventures of Alice in wonderland have not finished yet. It is time to help her! Alice is trapped in the labyrinth of wonderland.

name: Honor Cry: Aftermath
description: A war that has lasted over 100 years is coming to an end. Guide 2 soldiers on their mission to end the long conflict and escape with their lives. Includes hundreds of items, over 20 quests to complete and professional writing and voice acting.

name: Magic Flight Academy
description: MUST HAVE for VR arcade centers. Perfect for the first-time experience. Join the MFA and take a walk on a plank hundreds of meters above the ground, fly an enchanted broomstick around the ancient magical academy, cast spells with a magic wand and fight a fire-breathing dragon!

name: Guilty Summer Kiss 2 - Bloody Secret
description: School, girls, love in the air, and… a dark bloody mystery? Welcome to the Guilty Summer Kiss 2, a dating simulator with a detective story and a touch of fiction. Talk to all the heroines, unravel a tangle of riddles together and have fun with the game!

name: Shadow Council: The Puppeteers
description: Lead the clique of influential rebels and destroy the authoritarian empire from within. Make protest actions with the help of puppet oppositionists, bribe the parliament, lead the revolution - do everything to please the overseas patrons!

name: Gravity Jump
description: Gravity Jump - the meaning of the game is to control the flight of the blue cube, which continuously moves between the red cubes. When faced with them is the end of the game.

name: Office Race
description: Boss is out on some business trip and this means only one- it’s time to begin competition for the title of the Fastest Corporate Robot in the office! Prepare yourself for a merciless rivalization and great emotions! Race or die!

name: Dance With Memes
description: Dance With Memes is very simple arcade game. Play with your favorite Twitch emotes using music/videos from internet or your hard drive. Test your skill and compare it with other players. The key is precision - smashing buttons will get you nowhere. Game supports Steam Leaderboards for Youtube videos.

name: HexTrains
description: Tower defense with trains! Destroy colored cargo containers that are transported by trains while building turrets that match the respective colors.

name: Total Singu
description: Total Singu is a top down shooter. Follow the main character Singu, through this short but epic narrative. Discover and uncover the journey though 15 levels of exploration and find out what it means to be Total Singu.

name: Scary Maze
description: Scary Maze is an exciting horror-action hybrid where you run through a maze killing zombies, ready to eat you as soon as they can.

name: Stick Spartans
description: Stick Spartans brings fast paced family friendly action to the living room where players poke other Spartans to eliminate them until only one remains.

name: Through the Tomb
description: Through The Tomb is a first-person parkour game where the player is tasked with escaping the Tomb before time runs out. Along the way you will collect Artifacts that allow you to unlock new sections of the Tomb which will test the player's 3D platforming skills.

name: Sapper boom!
description: You are a sapper and your task in this game is to neutralize as many mines and bombs as you can.

name: Salty Seabird Bay
description: Salty Seabird Bay is a mini game bonanza set in the golden age of piracy. Play fun and engaging mini game modes with up to four friends locally.

name: Crossing Man
description:
Cross or you will die.
You become a public enemy in the skyscrapers!
Cross the buildings and run away from killers chasing you.

name: Qybe
description: Qybe is a fresh & innovative speed runner with dark atmosphere & smooth graphics, where you're set to navigate a Cube through lots of different Levels as fast - and as creatively - as possible. Easily create & share your own maps with the community using the included Editor - then watch others run them!

name: Lands of the Lost
description: A 3D Action RPG with Roguelike qualities, can you stop the Demon King??

name: Hope of humanity
description: Build your station! Raise the defense! Head up your fleet! Protect your station from alien invasion and save humanity from total destruction because you are the hero of the galactic empire!

name: SquareWorld
description: Sin descripción

name: Oneiros
description:
Will you be able to break the vicious circle ?
Can you regain control ? Experience the surreal adventure filled with puzzles and psychedelic visions.

name: Katto
description: Test the limits of your reaction time, memory, and focus. As bamboo and other obstacles rhythmically float toward you, thrust both of your katanas into the correct orientation with the right timing to chop through them. There are many different obstacles and levels to overcome!

name: The Federal Rescue
description: Rescue your father from captivity!

name: Lucky Shot
description: Lucky Shot is a game in which a player can demonstrate his accuracy and knowledge of physics. The player uses a cannon from which to shoot and collect all the coins. But it's not so simple.

name: U-Boot 1945
description: Commanding a submarine U-boot IIVc, get through the hostile dangerous waters full of traps, to the friendly shores.

name: Feather of Praying
description: Everyone has their own story and also has a different fate from others. No matter how cruel the reality is, we all have the right to hope for the future, look forward to, and look forward to, wishing that tomorrow will be better. Perhaps one day in the future, a chance will allow us to realize the desire that has always been buried in our hearts. But what did we get at that time ... or what we once expected?

name: 幻世情缘
description: 《幻世情缘》是一款角色扮演游戏，讲述少年踏上复仇之路后，经历的一系列离奇曲折的故事，而在这途中，遇到了来自异世界的少女......

name: Super Golf 2018
description: Computer version of the classic Golf game. Try to get into the hole and score as many points.

name: Up and Up
description: 3D parkour game that player need to find exit path before time.

name: 3D Gravity Rocket
description: Is a game about a mechanical robot that could fly thanks to having a propeller on its head. In the game you need to collect a certain number of nuts to win the level.

name: Lems
description:
Lems® are little creatures, running from point A to point B in order to find a new lair.
Save them from the obstacles on their path, using the platforms attached to your VR Controllers. Find the best platforms to use, then show your skill and agility by carrying the Lems safely to their new home across 50+ levels.

name: The Monsters' History Book
description: Beyond horrible, odd and black feelings, while there is a sincere relationship.However,The horrors more terrible than all these, become increasingly clear as the two linger around in the school. The nervous history of the bizarre deaths replays again as the history book be opened.

name: Treasure Hunter Man 2
description: THM2 is a retro metroidvania. Acquiring new equipment and upgrades opens up more explorable areas in all sorts of places. This adventure platformer takes you from the depth of a sunken underground city to the ruins in the sky all the way beyond the realms of reality. The game has multiple endings and additional challenges if you're really good at treasure hunting. A normal playthrough will take about 4-5 hours, and with the optional content about 7 to 8 hours.

name: Jumponaut
description: Jumponaut is a minimalist game about mastering strategic platforming.

name: R.O.V.E.R.
description: R.O.V.E.R. - first person shooter, with elements survival, in the post-apocalyptic setting.

name: Blueprint Word
description: Blueprint Word - A minimalistic 2d puzzle game. The player has only one task - to set the letters in the given order. The provided mechanisms will help you do this. Try it - it's easy.

name: That Which Binds Us
description: All she wanted was to get a bail bond for her troublesome boyfriend. That's when she met Idris, a very special kind of bondsman. With a flick of a knife, he asked Evalise one confusing question- what if we could make him forget you?

name: Juno: New Origins
description: Build rockets, airplanes, cars, and anything you can think of with highly customizable parts. Automate them with a visual programming language. Explore 3D planets and make your own. Share your creations online.

name: Debit and Credit: A Walk Through Accounting Hell
description:
Bad accountants go to accounting hell.
Complete an accountant's walk through accounting hell, solving puzzles and searching for save points.
This is a college student's attempt at making an interactive problem set for Accounting Principle students.

name: Moonbase Down
description: Enter a fearful Sci-Fi jaunt into a procedurally generated Moonbase. Rescue Jonesy the cat and avoid the woes of Alien impregnation.

name: Baikonur Space
description: Feel yourself as an astronaut. On your rocket, you can fly to distant space to meet new sensations. But for this you will need to improve your space vehicle and conduct a lot of training. So try to collect as much fuel as possible. With its help, drawings will be available to improve the missile. Thanks to them, your rocket will become the most powerful and fastest. Forward to the stars!:)

name: Cave Adventures
description: Cave Adventures is a dynamic game where you have to take on the role of a cute monster who can not escape from captivity in a parallel universe..

name: HerWam
description: World War II, Poland, partisans…

name: Ink Cipher
description: Crack cipher crossword puzzles in Ink Cipher!

name: Kilcount
description: Galactic war has ended in the complete annihilation of both sides. Orphans, old folks and animals hitch rides on ghost ships, bound for nowhere. Last night, you and a convoy of strangers boarded a scuttled Dominion warship. Home is far away.

name: LabRpgUp!
description: LabRpgUp is a unique J-RPG game. Travel through dark labyrinths filled with old guards. Can you find a way out?

name: Magnetic Pairs
description: A game made in combination of arcade and easy-logic gameplay styles. You need to magnetize and connect all orbs with a same color in tasks for logic and fast reaction.

name: Flaming Pixels
description: Do you want something bright, funny and a little crazy? We are pleased to introduce Flaming Pixels - simple yet incredibly exciting arcade platformer! Pixel characters and dynamic 8-bit music coupled with an excellent gameplay - take a dive into the retro atmosphere!

name: Force Tanks
description:
In Force Tanks, you fight alone on a range against an army of opponents!
Help your army detain the enemy's offensive on his legendary tank!
You are fighting alone, in the name of an armistice all over the world!

name: Lovecraft's Untold Stories
description: Lovecraft’s Untold Stories is an action RPG with rogue-like elements. Explore, improve your skills and gear, and fight cultists and creatures from the Mythos to stop the Old Ones’ plans in randomly generated levels based on Lovecraft stories. Madness and death await you—but maybe you can delay the inevitable…

name: Super Ball Wrestle Yes
description: Super Ball Wrestle Yes is a frantic local multiplayer physics based combat game from First Place Games. Challenge your friends in 2 to 4 player matches with goofy balls, tactical power ups and deep down silliness.

name: Rock Painting Story
description:
The game is pretty short to complete but have a lot of fun and a bit of drama. 
If support the developer, we will make a sequel of it!

name: SpellShokked!
description:
Voldemort? Gandalf? Wimps. 
 
Do you have what it takes to be a wizard? In SpellShokked, you assemble magical symbols into devastating spells that you then hurl at your opponents – other wizards, monsters, or your friends.

name: Bouldering Brawl
description: Play as one of many odd-unique characters (panda cosmonauts), dodge totally realistic mountaineering obstacles (swinging alphorns) and throw grotesque items (exploding goats) at your opponents in this ultimate friendship-destroying alpinism simulation

name: We Bare Bears Match3 Repairs
description:
Play innovative match-3 puzzles to help Grizz, Panda and Ice Bear fix up their cave in We Bare Bears Match3 Repairs!

Classic Match-3 gameplay meets strategic puzzles in creative new level designs. Try to make the biggest combo matches while taking on unique missions like rescuing seals, finding hidden wildlife, activating drones and more!

name: Subterraneus
description: Subterraneus is a point&click video game. A mouse, curiosity and some (twisted) logic are your only weapons to beat this adventure.

name: Lost in Spice
description: Lost in Spice is a cooking game for Oculus Rift in which you play as an abducted human forced to cook Earth food for aliens at the Intergalactic House of Planets. Now you have to dice up weird ingredients, cook them, and submit them in the time limit to get a good score. And if you don't, you'll be vaporized!

name: Blind Souls
description: Blind Souls is a first-person adventure game where you try to uncover the mystery surrounding the death of a medieval painter.

name: Wizard Street
description: Wizard Street is a virtual reality game to fight against dark souls.

name: Test your knowledge: Cities
description: Do you know what the most famous cities of the world look like? Moscow, Paris, Rome, Tokyo, Washington, Prague and many others. Test yourself with our interesting test

name: Your Ball Exploded
description: Your Ball Exploded - combines classical mechanics and complex gameplay. Destroying the obstacles you have to reach the goal. The levels are arranged in such a way that victory is not given easily. Only by counting your actions and thinking ahead of time, you can pass this game. Randomly generated events will add an surprise effect to the gameplay.

name: Stream Games
description: Stream Games is a set of mini games that Twitch Streamers can play with their viewers' interaction

name: Iterform
description: iterform is a minimalistic hardcore platformer with experimental respawn mechanic and ability to create replicas and respawn on them.

name: SurvivalZ Battlegrounds
description: SurvivalZ Battlegrounds is a mini Battle Royale in a cubic world!

name: Life's Playground
description: Life's Playground is the board game with a unique blend of familiar mechanics from Monopoly, Life, PayDay, combined together with a flavor all its own!

name: Learn to Drive on Moto Wars
description: Learn to Drive on Moto Wars - will remind you what is a real adrenaline! On the vast expanses of roads, many dangers await you, overcome by a bike. You have to participate in the survival races, where you'll fight hundreds of other riders who will do everything to make you lose.

name: Dark Fairies
description: A short Visual Novel, with ATB-type battles, made with RPG Maker MV. A legend of dark fairies.

name: !Dead Pixels Adventure!
description: Dead Pixels Adventure! - A unique retro game with elements of parkour, action and adventure. Go to the creepy 2D dungeon, filled with skeletons and evil spirits! Can you reach the end and defeat the terrible flying ship !?

name: Kitty Run
description: An amusing and complicated runner about Kitty. You play as a cat who must save his kittens. Jump through the barriers and stay alive.

name: Yakuza 3 Remastered
description: Yakuza 3 Remastered is an updated version of Yakuza 3, developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. Released as part of The Yakuza Remastered Collection in 2019, the remaster features improved graphics, a higher frame rate, and restored content that was cut from the original Western release. The game follows protagonist Kazuma Kiryu as he manages an orphanage in Okinawa while being drawn back into conflicts with the yakuza.

name: Yakuza 4 Remastered
description:
The game from 2010 has been remastered for the PS4 with one of Yakuza 4's main protagonists, Masayoshi Tanimura, being recast and getting a visual makeover.

Kamurocho, the entertainment district, is about to be bloodbath again. This time, we have four rising dragons. Each of the protagonists has a different fighting style and each of them has to go through sets of impossible trials to find their destiny. The line between game and reality is further blurred, earlier, in 2009, Sega hosts a beauty pageant, and the seven winners became models of their game avatars. Some of them are bar girls, some are hostesses, visit the "play spots" with them, ask them to date in the spas and sing karaoke with them. The Rising Dragon is looking for a successor, will you be it?

name: Yakuza 5 Remastered
description: Experience the fifth chapter of the Kazuma Kiryu saga in 1080p and 60fps. Get ready for a Yakuza experience of unprecedented scale. Follow five characters across five Japanese cities, each trying to achieve their dream. The connections between them bring them together, but the conflict that unfolds is nothing any of them could have predicted.

name: Team Sonic Racing
description: Team Sonic Racing combines the best elements of arcade and fast-paced competitive style racing as you face-off with friends in intense multiplayer racing.

name: Undead Valley
description: Undead Valley is a Zombie Survival RPG that puts the player into the role of a survivor during the Zombie Apocalypse. The player must survive by scavenging, fighting and building relationships with NPC's.

name: Fallout 76
description: Bethesda Game Studios welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fall you and your fellow Vault Dwellers, chosen from the nation’s best and brightest, emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Play solo or join together as you explore, quest, build, and triumph against the wasteland’s greatest threats. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story. Experience the largest, most dynamic world ever created in the legendary Fallout universe.

name: Space Maze
description:
"It's a place with high walls or hedges, where you wander around and get lost.".
- Well, that would be your answer if someone ask you to play a maze game. In fact it's a lot more complicated than that. Have you ever travel to a strange city and get lost? or what is the shortest way to your favorite barber shop? Yes, every place around us is a Labyrinth, you won't recognize it because you are in its. Humanity has always enjoyed patterns.

- Space Maze is a procedural 3D labyrinth. You get to navigate the way to higher level, collecting reward. There is no end level, so you can play until the game crash. Learn how to get out of the maze is one thing, Space Maze introduce to you a new mechanic that allow you to bet on every level you play. Use your money wisely or you will lose all of it. Also be careful with each movement in the maze, there are lots of obstacles trying to prevent you to reach the end. The maze is not design for impatient person, or you will learn it the hard way.
Destination:

Earn $1M to win special award in game.

Space Maze include:

3 Difference Map theme with story of its own.
4 Drone to choose from but you must earn enough to unlock it.
Infinite level: play until your computer crash.
Money and risk management to advance to new level.

name: Lets fall
description:
This easy-to-play and addictive arcade is going to give you a keen pleasure. You will hop from platform to platform with platform speed increased and width reduced as you progress through the game. There are achievements to give you permanent perks. Some of them will bring you additional points, while others will help to pass through the zones.

Please note that not every time you land on the middle of the platform you get the extra points, but every third (the bonus is accumulative and bring three points at once)

Features:
-Intuitive control
-Ease-to-play wherever you are
-Various achievements
-No in-game purchases.

Have fun!

name: SingStar: Made in Germany
description: SingStar: Made in Germany is a karaoke game exclusively released in Germany. It exclusively features songs by German (respectively German produced) artists. There are no changes to the gameplay formula: player(s) sing into a microphone and the game gives points based on the performance. The only basis of assessment is if the correct note is hit with the correct timeing; the sung words or octave does not play into the result.

name: Golem
description: Golem is a heart-warming adventure about a young girl and a shape-shifting golem who must navigate the ruins of an ancient tower to solve its challenging puzzles and re-activate its long-dormant machines.

name: The Sibling Experiment
description: An indie visual novel with family themes.

name: Control Tower Full
description: Sin descripción

name: Stealth Butcher My Neighbor
description: Sin descripción

name: Gardius Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Hero Defense King
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmos Invictus
description: Choose your faction and embark on an epic fight to determine the fate of humanity in Cosmos Invictus, an interstellar collectible card game. Prepare to engage in intense, strategic battles with Mechs, pilots and unique customizable spaceships. Go head-to-head with other players in the PvP BattleZone arena, face off against the computer in PvC missions, or scout out challenges for profitable rewards. Will your vision for humanity come to light… or disappear into oblivion?

name: The Sunset 2096
description: Mankind invented Them - to simplify your life. Mechanoids to perform all of our mundane activities which finally completely replaced humans in the workspace. Creating the perfect workers turned out to be a mistake.

name: Catch & Release
description: Catch & Release places you on a beautiful mountain lake and lets you freely explore and row around while you choose your fishing spot and take in the scenery.

name: 1Dimensional Desperado
description: Grab your favourite brand of Snake Oil and sink some time into this Western-Themed, Card-Inspired, Procedurally-Generated, Straight-To-The-Point game!

name: Green Blood
description:
The sum of fear and action 
In the absence of contact with the secret Mars base, 
Special Agent Scott Tiger is put into the investigation.

name: Illusion: A Tale of the Mind
description: Illusion is a puzzle exploration game set in the ambience of the early 1920’s Parisian cabaret. Step into the shoes of a young girl named Emma and live her adventures as she is trapped inside the mind of a mad man. Embark on her journey through the mind’s-eye of her captors, living in a fractured world of old memories and festering wounds, that paradoxically reveals itself to be also a place of great beauty and intrigue.

name: Transmogrify
description: An unusual 2D puzzle platformer that blends challenging action & handcrafted puzzles. Armed only with your peculiar gun (and a ton of power ups), you must transmogrify monsters into the tools you need to solve the puzzles. Escape the infested facility!

name: Odd Island
description: Odd Island is a hold & gun, boss rush, time attack action-side-scrolling game. Odd Island describes the adventure of cute and small Chibi to win the Badge at the end of the beautiful island.

name: Basketball Shoots
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Tycoon
description: Build and Manage your own arcade. Pick the best cabinets, creating your own machines, hire and fire staff, plan and manage your venues and try not to blow everything up!

name: Heroes Arena
description:
Welcome to Heroes Arena!
Explore the Endless Arena, level up, buy new weapons, upgrade them, get a lot of loot on Loot Corridor, unlock player skins!

name: Instinct
description:
It’s so nice to live with the person you like, to have everything necessary for a good life, to depend on yourself and have a good time.

Up till recently my wonderful life of leisure in the pet store ran its natural course, when suddenly a weird bozo appeared in the house. Why did Mistress hire him?

name: Warlock: Tower Defence
description: Warlock: Tower Defence is a story driven tower defence game, giving players access to 6 elemental magics to face challenges spread across 5 chapters.

name: Stickmen Empire
description:
Stickmen Empire is a turn based strategy game. It has simple rules but allows for complex tactical decisions.

- Simple gameplay, complex strategy
- Use buildings and units
- Play 70 levels

Conquer all territories and rule your empire!

name: Mission: Thunderbolt
description: Sin descripción

name: Bring Her Home
description: A survival walking sim, where HOW you survive is just as important as IF you survive.

name: Artful Balancer
description: Sin descripción

name: Orogenesis
description: Orogenesis, an RPG with the twist of exploring a nightmarish and funky universe!

name: Yaga
description:
Yaga is an action RPG with a charming narrative that adapts to your choices, set in the world of Slavic folklore.
Play as Ivan, a one-handed blacksmith cursed with incredible bad luck.

name: Tempo Quest
description: Multiplayer roguelike mixed with DDR

name: Terrordrome: Reign of the Legends
description:
Terrordrome - Reign Of The Legends, the first horror fighting game with classic monsters, urban legends and mythological creatures.
Horror icons and urban legends clash in a battle to the death in this original fighting game from the TerrorTeam. Reign Of The Legends explores legends, folklore, myths and the paranormal both in its characters and stages, while incorporating conspiracy theories as the base material for its storyline. Legends and icons are re-imagined in a story set in the 20th century, continuing the legacy of many of the world's favorite monsters and cryptids.

name: PyroMind
description: Simultaneously turn-based and real-time, PyroMind is a delightfully unforgiving action puzzler about defusing bombs and escaping chain reactions. Play alone, blow up your friend or challenge a bot in a unique dimension, where everything explodes and one small mistake can blast you to smithereens.

name: Yomawari: The Long Night Collection
description: Traverse the haunting world of Yomawari: Night Alone as a young girl searches for her sister, or share in the terror facing schoolgirls Yui and Haru in Yomawari: Midnight Shadows. Uncover the mysteries plaguing a rural Japanese town, hide from the things lurking in the night, and maybe get home alive...

name: Arca's Path
description: Tricked by a wicked android witch, you must seek a path home and escape the simulated world of Arca. Fully integrated across all major VR platforms, with no need for controllers, Arca’s Path is an easy to pick up atmospheric VR game.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: Write your own epic odyssey and become a legendary Spartan hero in Assassin's Creed Odyssey, an inspiring adventure where you must forge your destiny and define your own path in a world on the brink of tearing itself apart. Influence how history unfolds as you experience a rich and ever-changing world shaped by your decisions.

name: World Soccer Pinball
description: The most entertaining Pinball is back! Enjoy World Soccer Pinball, a perfect reproduction of a real pinball machine, with all the graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Them Bombs!
description: You, your friends and a ticking bomb. Work together and see how many people you can save!

name: VR Desert Roller Coaster - Egypt
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Roller Coaster VR
description: Jump into hyper speed and hold tight as you experience this galactic ride. Mars, Venus, Earth, the Stars and much more as you dive deeper into space. Remember the galaxy is vast and your journey starts here.

name: The Dust
description: Sin descripción

name: Car Stunt Challenge 2018
description: Sin descripción

name: Auto Theft Gang Wars

With sword in hand, a bow on your back and powerful magic at your finger tips, the fate of the realm weighs heavily on your capable shoulders.

name: Galak-Z: The Void
description:
An updated and re-branded version of the original game.

"The long awaited DLC for GALAK-Z is finally upon us! We are rebranding GALAK-Z to reflect the update as well as to make it clear that the new content opens up a whole new way to play. With newly implemented Online Leaderboards, The Void game mode provides an endless playground for players to showcase their moment-to-moment survival skills and to post their scores as a challenge to friends and foes alike. GALAK-Z is all about honing one’s ability to dexterously pilot their ship and to strategically leverage the mech form to take on any set of enemies and environmental hazards. While GALAK-Z still has the narrative based procedurally generated Rogue and Arcade story modes, The Void focuses on the essence of GALAK-Z while providing an ever-escalating difficulty curve to challenge even the most skilled player. And to help encourage true competition, we have introduced the Daily Challenge that provides the same unique loadout and level layout seed for all who participate each and every day. Players can come back daily to see who will top the leaderboards."

description: Block puzzle games!

name: Grim Tales: The White Lady

name: Lead Wars
description: Lead Wars is a turn-based strategy war game, where unlike most turn-based games you aren’t constrained to a grid. It simulates a style of game played in the 70s and 80s, where you play on a real piece of paper and just use a pencil and your imagination to create the battlefield, units and rules of play.

name: Trigon
description:
Trigon is a addicting brain teaser - a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, while also training your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test with this exciting title. It will help you develop logic, and train your mental capacity.

The concept is simple - on a triangle board, combine puzzle blocks and clear the board by placing them strategically to create lines. Clear multiple lines at a time to get diamonds.

name: Dragon Lapis
description: A thousand years ago, a great battle ensued between two dragons, one gold and the other silver, where they were sealed away. However, the real tale begins many centuries later after the Silver Dragon reawakens, and launches an assault on a frontier village in the far north. There, a royal knight by the name of Lucas serves as a guard after being relegated to the rural and much isolated location by the King. Yet, little does he know he is, in fact, a descendant of the hero, Alaric, who once sealed the Gold and Silver Dragons in human form. Nonetheless, when tragedy strikes, he soon finds his place, and after teaming up with a band of unlikely companions, sets out on an adventure to save the world.

name: Defoliation
description: 《Defoliation》 is a mystery puzzle game.

name: She Dreams Elsewhere
description: She Dreams Elsewhere is a surreal adventure RPG about dreams and the extent to which they mirror reality. You play as Thalia, an anxiety-ridden, comatose woman on a journey to defeat the nightmares preventing her from awakening, while also finding out how exactly this mess happened in the first place.

name: Moon Landing VR
description:
Ever want to casually explore our solar system from the comfort of your own home? Now you can in Moon Landing VR -
Have Fun While Learning!

name: Beerd leaver
description: Have you ever wanted to try yourself in the role of a bird-bee? Then this is what you need. Once a small bee gathered nectar and did not notice how the evening came. In addition, the weather began to deteriorate, and it is far from home. Help the bee to get to the house, avoiding terrible predators and terrible weather conditions. You game you will have several lives for which you will be able to set a new record and try to take the small bee home to the family.

name: Zombie Last Stands
description: Back in 1879, the Zulu War, where a small detachment of British soldiers garrisoning a remote farmhouse must hold out until help finally arrives.

name: Motif.
description: The aim of the puzzle is to create the desired motif using the pieces that are given to you. In doing so, you need to pay attention to how many pieces the play area is divided into. The parts have symmetry equal to the number of areas on the screen. For this reason, you have to carefully choose where you need to put the pieces. Motif makes you part of an artistic journey. Thanks to its relaxed atmosphere, it makes you aware of your artistic talents. Features: • 200+ carefully crafted motif levels • Beautifully designed minimal puzzle game • Support for both touch and gamepad • Exclusive for sharpest mind and artistic souls.

name: Galak-Z: Varient Mobile
description:
"Galak-Z: Variant Mobile is a brand new, one-of-a-kind, space-shooting action-RPG made exclusively for mobile devices.

Experience stunning space combat from the cockpit of a sleek spaceship or a giant Mech! Battle space pirates, squish giant bugs, challenge Dark Bot bosses, and crush the evil Baron’s army of nasty Imperial troops through more than a hundred endlessly replayable missions in a full-scale story campaign. Fight against player-created squads in the Bot Battle League and earn Trophies to reap better rewards. Collect upgrades, salvage, relics, and Bots to make your spaceship and Mech even stronger, and fight to become the highest ranked pilot in the galaxy!"

What really happened on this planet?

name: Hello Stars
description:
Must use brain to finish all levels. It's easy to learn but very difficult to master.
The job of each level is to guide a ball from a predetermined start point so that it touches all of the stars placed on the level. The ball and nearly all objects on the screen are affected by gravity. The first few levels are almost too easy, but as the difficulty increases you'll be thankful that you were able to practice the fundamentals of draw. As the game progresses, you'll have to use all sorts of theory to figure out a solution for each puzzle.

name: Escape from Jay Is Games
description:
It's a room escape point and click puzzle game.

In essence, your main goal is to get out of a weird room filled with old arcade machines, strange computers, and what appears to be some kind of alien hooked to a virtual reality headset. To do that, you must gather useful objects and use them in ingenious ways.

The players had the possibility to customize their own characters, play with them and share photos with their friends.

Toonix! is currently unplayable due to a server shutdown happened in 2017.

name: Slider
description: Colourful game like a 2D Q*Bert. Run around the level, painting the background blocks as you go and avoiding enemies. There are many traps, sliding blocks, one-way blocks and teleports - also special items such as time-stop and extra firepower to zap the baddies with.

name: Crash Fortress! +
description:
Mobile edition of the popular japanese Flash game "Gekitotsu Yōsai!" (2008) developed by Suznooto and published on Android/iOS devices by Cygames for their Chogetsuku collection.

This is a physics-based action/puzzle/strategy game in which two moving fortress fight against each other trying to destroy the opponent's vehicle (see also C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars by ZeptoLab). The player must build a fortress buying weapons and soldiers with limited resources.

The game is not available outside of Japan.

name: Surfatron
description: You play as Dusty, a good-hearted but snarky now-sentient video game console from the 90's. His clock speed isn't what it used to be, but what he lacks for in megahertz he makes up for with experience and attitude! He's trapped inside the Pixelverse - the space and time that exists between the hardware and his currently loaded game cartridge - left to battle the bugs and corruptions that the game developers left behind!

This game contains some puzzles and we kindly advise you not to spoil other player's fun by leaving the solution to the puzzles when you are leaving your review on this game.

description: "Hist Maker" is an element synthesis puzzle solving game with some levels which has the function of historical education. When you are in the turbulent flow of time and see for yourself that the history of humanity is torn apart, only the historical knowledge and logical ability in your mind can help us to reshape this world.

name: Z Dawn
description: The Z infection was spread, the world everyone know ceased to exist. Lead a group of survivors throughout a zombie apocalypse in an astounding strategic challenge to try to make the best possible decisions.Survive, loot, explore, build, defend, attack!

name: Final Missions
description: Final Missions is an infiltration and shooting game. Take control of your player, reach the goal without being detected by the enemies that patrol and finish with objectives to overcome missions.

When the best friend becomes an enemy, and the main villain becomes you yourself and blood flows like a river, someone will definitely have to answer the main question -
Who is behind the awakening of ancient evil and is there still a chance for humanity?

name: Speckle: Chill Puzzle Game
description: Speckle is a simple puzzle game, that attempts to deliver a fun and relaxing experience. However, this is a puzzle game, so ‘rage quitting’ is a possible side effect!

name: Iest Dva Stula
description:
Your character ended up in a prison cell with inveterate prisoners, and his task is to save his point by passing the test of riddles. Well, or become a rooster, no one forbids! Although this game is more of a prison survival where you have to save your point.
10 prison puzzles, up to 50 new puzzles in updates! For more realism, you won't be able to exit the game until you win!

name: Teleportals. I swear it's a nice game.
description: I swear it's a nice puzzle game.

name: The King's Request
description: This short adventure game uses your knowledge of the human body and concepts from science, biology, physiology, anatomy, medicine, biomed, nursing, pharmacy, health or exercise science as your weapon! There's no negative if you get a question wrong - so have a go and save the kingdom!!

name: Kick Them Out!!!
description:
Kick Them Out!!! will test your dexterity.
Control a customizable cumbrous ball through 40 challenging levels that requires skill, patience and self-control to cope with failure.

name: My RC Buggy! VR
description: My RC Buggy! VR is a RC car themed room-scaled VR game with an emphasis on part collection -- Mix and match parts and take on different race tracks!

name: PeeTee Babybuu
description: Down the road, the neighbors knew...

name: Chameleon Run: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition features a handful of new courses, and even a fourth additional challenge to complete for each level.

name: The Humans Collection
description:
The Humans Collection has 80 levels of Neanderthal puzzle-adventure. There are a cave-load of pre-historic enemies to battle, including dinosaurs and rival tribesmen
Tons of obstacles to overcome, including cliffs, boulders and famished carnivores
Discover and master the use of fire, spears, ropes, even powerful witch doctors

name: Google Spotlight Stories: On Ice
description: “On Ice” tells the story of an over-the-top, sci-fi themed ice show and its star, who suddenly finds he has competition for the spotlight from an unlikely rival.

name: Bucket Balls
description: Shoot those balls and fill up your buckets before the time runs out in this simple yet challenging puzzle game.

name: EthereaVR
description:
Immersive VR Space Combat with intense action -- a shoot'em up open universe with a bit of strategy elements.

Every star and planet you see in Etherea is visitable in real time, without any cuts or loading screens. You can take off on different spacecrafts and go explore the galaxy, finding artificially intelligent procedural challenges.

name: The X-Files Game
description: The X-Files Game is an interactive movie point-and-click adventure video game developed by HyperBole Studios and first published by Fox Interactive. The game was released for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS and PlayStation in 1998, and is based on the television series The X-Files.

name: Destiny 2: Forsaken
description: Take justice into your own hands as you venture into a new frontier filled with enemies, allies, untold mysteries, and treasures waiting to be uncovered.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2: Special Edition
description: America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs. Those who will not surrender or succumb are killed.

name: Red Dead Redemption II: Ultimate Edition
description: America, 1899. The end of the Wild West era has begun. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him. Includes Red Dead Redemption II: Story Mode and Red Dead Online.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2: Collector's Box
description:
The Red Dead Redemption 2: Collector's Box features a curated assortment of outlaw essentials all packaged in a thick gauged metal tithing box.

Metal Tithing Box with Lock & Key: Inspired by the lockbox used by the Van der Linde gang to stash contributions to the camp's upkeep, this thick gauged metal box includes a lock & key, and features black metal band detailing and an engraved Cornwall Freight & Commodities plaque.

Collectable Challenge Coin: Featuring the majestic American Buffalo on one side and a scenic landscape on the other side, this engraved, gold-colored collectable coin comes in a magnetic presentation holder with a black, engraved plaque describing the history of this endangered species.

Double Sided Puzzle: This double-sided, 100-piece wooden jigsaw puzzle features an illustrated view of the bustling port of Saint Denis on one side, and a classically inspired Rockstar Games logo on the reverse.

Six Shooter Bandana: A staple for any frontier outlaw, this bandana features a traditional paisley-inspired pattern with hidden weapon iconography throughout.

Treasure Map: Printed on durable, unrippable paper, this exclusive treasure map reveals the location of some buried treasure that may start Arthur on a search for more riches hidden throughout the world of Red Dead Redemption 2.

Pin Set: This set of six individual pins includes representations of key weapons from Red Dead Redemption 2 including a shotgun, revolver and Dead Eye "X" marker. The set comes in a canvas carrying bag.

Playing Cards: Commemorate the outlaws of the Van der Linde gang with this fully illustrated deck of playing cards featuring key members of the gang including Arthur Morgan, John Marston, Javier Escuella, Bill Williamson and Dutch van der Linde.

Wheeler, Rawson and Co. Catalogue: The one-stop shop for everything from weapons to clothing, the Wheeler, Rawson and Co. Catalogue is an essential shopping tool for turn of the century life. This complete 150-page book is a replica of the edition found in stores throughout Red Dead Redemption 2.

12 Cigarette Cards: These beautifully-illustrated collectable cards can be found throughout the world of Red Dead Redemption 2. This physical collection includes one select card from each set like Famous Gunslingers and Outlaws, Stars of the Stage and Marvels of Travel and Locomotion.

name: The Journey Down Trilogy
description:
The Journey Down is a classic point-and-click saga with an Afro-Caribbean vibe. Get ready to embark on an epic journey of brain-teasing adventure! With the trilogy bundle you'll get all chapters in one!

Features
- A twisting tale of intriguing adventure
- Tons of hand-painted environments
- An all original jazzy reggae soundtrack
- A fully voiced cast (English)
- HD art and animations
- English and German subtitles

name: Hitman 2
description: Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in Hitman 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world’s most creative assassin, Agent 47 in the ultimate spy thriller story.

name: Planet X3
description: In this comprehensive and innovative real time strategy game, you command the Terran front line troops and have to secure the planet from the Protoids, who are competing with you for a stronghold on this planet. Harvest resources, build weapons, and expand your territory to combat the enemy. Planet X3 gives you a wide scenario of environments that are more challenging than last time. Fight in land, water, in the snowy North Pole, and around lava. Each map presents different challenges , and strategy. Enjoy the amazing scenery and musical scores, while challenging your skills against a relentless opponent.

name: Code Vein: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Code Vein
Special Box
Mia Karnstein Figure (17cm tall)
Artbook (Code Vein World Report)
Original Soundtrack CD (22-track)
DLC

name: oOo: Ascension
